--- format: html: css: quarto_styles.css --- # Visualization Gallery A collection of sample visualizations created in R using `gt`, `ggplot2`, or other extension packages. You can find more of my visualizations on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/andreweatherman). ## Tables with `gt`
